column4: Depot (shipyard or ship repair facility) Accomplish
Depot Assisted by Ship’s Force or Unit Personnel
IMA (tender or repair ship, etc.) Accomplish
IMA Assisted by Ship’s Force or Unit Personnel

Fleet Technical Support.  TYCOM Support Unit (floating dry dock, etc.) 
accomplished or Technical Assistance from NAVSEA, Regional 
Maintenance Center or Contractor Representative.
TYCOM Support Un Assisted by Ship’s Force or Unit Personnel
Ship’s Force or Unit Personnel Accomplish
Insufficient Time in the Availability to Complete the Task
Covered by an Existing Ship Alteration
Duplicate of Another Job Control Number (JCN)

Disapproved. 
*  This screening code disapproves the accomplishment of a work item 
by an outside activity.  It does not prevent entry of the deferral into the 
CSMP, which is the decision of the Commanding Officer

Remove from Current Ship’s or Unit Maintenance Project (CSMP).  Pass 
to history (to be assigned by TYCOM only). 
**  This screening code is restricted to the removal of INSURV items 
from the CSMP for which, in the opinion of the Ship’s or Unit’s IUC and 
TYCOM, the ship has no responsibility for accomplishment.
